body.p: The boards began their joint discussions in January 2010. They discussed nearly all the issues together so that each board would benefit from hearing the rationale for the other board’s decisions on each issue. They initially focused on the following:

li.p: differences between the requirements in Topic 820 and the proposals in the IASB’s exposure draft;
comments received on the IASB’s exposure draft (including comments received from participants at the IASB’s round‑table meetings held in November and December 2009); and
feedback received on the implementation of Topic 820 (eg issues discussed by the FASB’s Valuation Resource Group).
